name: Trail Arena
description:
Trail Arena is a remake of my origianal game Tron™ Remix. Same rules, same game, same controls, but now with a menu, and quit button. This was what I thought was the best game in my blender arcade, so I have released it as a standalone game! If this game is a success, I plan to update it with new maps, characters, and sounds. 

As always, please comment your thoughts down below, and consider a follow and rating. ;)

The music in the game is from the YouTube audio library.

Shortened the intro.
